content.prompt: Beginning in the thirteenth paragraph (“It was . . . trees”), what impact does the shift in setting have on the narrative?

choices.label: It develops Mrs. Chandler’s psychological character.
It emphasizes Mrs. Chandler’s domestic habits.
It elaborates on Mrs. Chandler’s fears of society.
It establishes Mrs. Chandler’s passion for hunting.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the function of setting in a narrative.
